LanguageData.Mech_Centipede.label: kırkayak
LanguageData.Mech_Centipede.description: Heavy combat mechanoids that glide on dozens of tiny legs. Their heavy armor and firepower makes them very effective against bunched-up static defenders. They are somewhat vulnerable to mobile hit-and-run tactics.

LanguageData.Mech_Scyther.label: tırpanlı
LanguageData.Mech_Scyther.description: Fast, spindly, human-sized combat mechanoids. They usually carry one primary ranged weapon, and their bodies are adorned with two articulated blades to make them deadly in melee combat. They don't use cover. Best handled by concentrated, overwhelming force.
